TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MemoryCacheElement extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class MemoryCacheElement Inherits ConfigurationElement

summary.span: 定義用來設定根據 類別之快取的項目。

span.span: Defines an element that is used to configure a cache that is based on the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會定義可用來設定快取的項目。The class defines a element that you can use to configure the cache. 多個 類別執行個體可以用於單一應用程式。Multiple instances of the class can be used in a single application. 組態檔中的每個 `memoryCache` 項目都可以包含具名 執行個體的設定。Each `memoryCache` element in the configuration file can contain settings for a named instance. `memoryCache`元素需要`namedCaches`子項目。The `memoryCache` element requires a `namedCaches` child element. 若要定義具名快取除了預設組態的組態，您可以加入`namedCaches`項目。To define named configurations of the cache in addition to the default configuration, you can add `namedCaches` elements. 如需如何加入具名快取組態的詳細資訊，請參閱[ <namedCaches>項目 （快取設定）](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/namedcaches-element-cache-settings.md)。For more information about how to add named cache configurations, see [<namedCaches> Element (Cache Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/namedcaches-element-cache-settings.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name) cil managed

param.name: name
param.span: 特定快取組態的專屬名稱。

span.span: The unique name for a specific cache configuration.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int CacheMemoryLimitMegabytes { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.CacheMemoryLimitMegabytes : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 物件的執行個體可成長的記憶體大小上限 (以 MB 為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum memory size, in megabytes, that an instance of a object can grow to.

value.span: 記憶體數量大小上限，以 MB 為單位。

span.span: The amount of maximum memory size, in megabytes.

value.span: 預設值為零，表示 執行個體會根據電腦上安裝的記憶體數量管理本身的記憶體。

span.span: The default is zero, which indicates that instances manage their own memory based on the amount of memory that is installed on the computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性值代表`cacheMemoryLimitMegabytes`中的組態屬性`namedCaches`組態項目。The property value represents the `cacheMemoryLimitMegabytes` configuration attribute in the `namedCaches` configuration element. 快取大小超過指定的限制，如果記憶體快取實作就會移除快取項目。If the cache size exceeds the specified limit, the memory cache implementation removes cache entries. 這個屬性可以分別設定`namedCaches`項目，與每個`namedCaches`對應至唯一快取的組態項目。This property can be set individually in `namedCaches` elements, with each `namedCaches` element corresponding to a unique cache configuration. 設定可讀取屬性從`cacheMemoryLimitMegabytes`組態檔中的組態屬性。The settings for the property can be read from the `cacheMemoryLimitMegabytes` configuration attribute in the configuration file. 或者，設定可以傳遞時類別初始化。Alternatively, the settings can be passed when the class is initialized. 如需如何設定快取的詳細資訊，請參閱[ <namedCaches>項目 （快取設定）](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/namedcaches-element-cache-settings.md)。For more information about how to configure the cache, see [<namedCaches> Element (Cache Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/namedcaches-element-cache-settings.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Name : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定特定快取組態的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of a particular cache configuration.
The name of a cache configuration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性值是針對特定的具名快取組態的唯一識別碼。The property value is the unique identifier for a particular named cache configuration. 每個快取組態必須是唯一的識別碼。Each cache configuration must have a unique ID. 在`memoryCache`所定義的組態檔的唯一快取組態區段`namedCaches`組態集合。In the `memoryCache` section of a configuration file, a unique cache configuration is defined by a `namedCaches` configuration collection. 每個具名快取項目需要在組態檔中的唯一名稱。Each named cache entry requires a unique name in the configuration file. 此值必須至少為一個字元。This value must be at least one character long. 如需如何設定快取的詳細資訊，請參閱[ <namedCaches>項目 （快取設定）](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/namedcaches-element-cache-settings.md)。For more information about how to configure the cache, see [<namedCaches> Element (Cache Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/namedcaches-element-cache-settings.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int PhysicalMemoryLimitPercentage { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.PhysicalMemoryLimitPercentage : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定可供快取使用的伺服器記憶體百分比。

span.span: Gets or sets the percentage of server memory that can be used by the cache.

value.span: 可供快取使用的實體記憶體百分比，以 1 到 100 之間的整數值表示。

span.span: The percentage of physical memory that the cache can use, expressed as an integer value from 1 to 100.

value.span: 預設值為零，表示 執行個體會根據電腦上安裝的記憶體數量管理本身的記憶體。

span.span: The default is zero, which indicates that instances manage their own memory based on the amount of memory that is installed on the computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 快取大小超過指定的限制，如果記憶體快取實作就會移除快取項目。If the cache size exceeds the specified limit, the memory cache implementation removes cache entries. 設定可讀取屬性從`physicalMemoryLimitPercentage`應用程式組態檔中的組態屬性。The setting for the property can be read from `physicalMemoryLimitPercentage` configuration attribute in the application configuration file. 或者，此值可以傳遞時類別初始化。Alternatively, the value can be passed when the class is initialized. 如需如何設定快取的詳細資訊，請參閱[ <namedCaches>項目 （快取設定）](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/namedcaches-element-cache-settings.md)。For more information about how to configure the cache, see [<namedCaches> Element (Cache Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/namedcaches-element-cache-settings.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan PollingInterval { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.PollingInterval : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定表示時間間隔的值，快取實作經過這段時間間隔之後，就會將目前的記憶體負載與針對快取執行個體所設定的絕對記憶體限制和百分比記憶體限制進行比較。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the time interval after which the cache implementation compares the current memory load against the absolute and percentage-based memory limits that are set for the cache instance.

value.span: 時間間隔，快取實作每隔這個時間間隔，就會將目前的記憶體負載與針對快取執行個體所設定的絕對記憶體限制和百分比記憶體限制進行比較。

span.span: The time interval after which the cache implementation compares the current memory load against the absolute and percentage-based memory limits that are set for the cache instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會對應至`pollingInterval`的組態屬性`namedCaches`項目。The property corresponds to the `pollingInterval` configuration attribute of the `namedCaches` element. 這個設定屬性的設定會以格式指定`HH:MM:SS`而且能夠從讀取`pollingInterval`應用程式組態中的組態屬性。The settings for this configuration attribute are specified in the format `HH:MM:SS` and can be read from the `pollingInterval` configuration attribute in the application configuration. 或者，此值可以傳遞時類別初始化。Alternatively, the value can be passed when the class is initialized. 如需如何設定快取的詳細資訊，請參閱[ <namedCaches>項目 （快取設定）](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/namedcaches-element-cache-settings.md)。For more information about how to configure the cache, see [<namedCaches> Element (Cache Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/namedcaches-element-cache-settings.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property Properties As ConfigurationPropertyCollection
